trans-unit.source: Represents a dynamic update map builder.
This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics.
[Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561) Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
[Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563) Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update.

[Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564) Describes how to use <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowIdentity> to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side.
[Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565) Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint.

[How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566) This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time.

[How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567) This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref> class.
Creates map for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The created map.
Creates map for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref> with specified activities blocking update.
The activities blocking update.
The created map.
Gets the disallow update inside for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The disallow update inside.
Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref> is for implementation.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref> is for implementation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the lookup implementation map for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The lookup implementation map.
Gets or sets the lookup map item for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The lookup map item.
Gets or sets the location reference environment for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The location reference environment.
Gets or sets the original workflow definition.
The original workflow definition.
Gets or sets the updated environment for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The updated environment.
Gets or sets the updated workflow definition for the <xref href="System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMapBuilder"></xref>.
The updated workflow definition.
